p: Previously, we have reported that argan oil and argan press-cake have an anti-melanogenesis effect on B16 melanoma cells by decreasing Mitf and the expression of melanogenic enzymes [ 10, 11]. The present study determined the effect of argan leaves extract (ALE) on melanogenesis and evaluated its antioxidant activities, quantified the phenolic compounds present in ALE, and characterized these compounds by UPLC-ESI-HRMS analysis.
